import { DOCUMENT } from '@angular/common'; import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.css'] }) export class MenuComponent { isNightToggle: boolean = false; constructor(@Inject(DOCUMENT) private document: Document){} handleNightDayClick(){ } }
